meanings: Noun 공 모양의 물체, 덩이, 뭉치

vlive.korean: 언젠가는 빛을 볼 수 있겠지? "I'm sure I will shine one day?" 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 산이의 소소한 일상🥰
vlive.english: "I'm sure I will shine one day?"

vlive.korean: 손금 볼 줄 아시는 분들 계시나요? Anyone know how to do palm-reading? 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #49
vlive.english: Anyone know how to do palm-reading?

vlive.korean: '50번째 그거 언제 볼 수 있어요?' "When can we watch the 50th episode?" 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #49
"리노리방 자주 볼 수 있는 거죠?" "Can I see you on V LIVE more often?" 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: "Can I see you on V LIVE more often?"

vlive.korean: 나오면 볼 수 있지 않을까요? Won't I be able to see it if it comes up? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 다시 럽하👋
vlive.english: Won't I be able to see it if it comes up?

examples.korean: He kissed her lightly on the cheek. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그녀의 볼에 가볍게 입을 맞추었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He kissed her lightly on the cheek. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She lived to see her first grandchild. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 첫 손주를 볼 때까지 살았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She lived to see her first grandchild. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He kissed her chastely on the cheek. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그녀의 볼에 대고 담백하게 키스를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He kissed her chastely on the cheek. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She slid out while no one was looking. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아무도 안 볼 때 슬며시 빠져나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She slid out while no one was looking. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He gave her a friendly peck on the cheek. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그녀의 볼에 다정하게 가벼운 키스를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He gave her a friendly peck on the cheek. Add to Wordbook
